mapper.insert: insert into sea_data (v_id, tid, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_spic, v_gpic, v_hit, v_money, v_rank, v_digg, v_tread, v_commend, v_wrong, v_ismake, v_actor, v_color, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_topic, v_note, v_tags, v_letter, v_isunion, v_recycled, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_score, v_scorenum, v_nickname, v_reweek, v_douban, v_mtime, v_imdb, v_tvs, v_company, v_dayhit, v_weekhit, v_monthhit, v_daytime, v_weektime, v_monthtime, v_len, v_total, v_ver, v_psd, v_extratype, v_jq, v_longtxt) values (#{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vSpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vGpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vMoney,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vRank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vDigg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vTread,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vCommend,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vWrong,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vIsmake,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vPublishyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vPublisharea,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vTopic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vTags,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vIsunion,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vRecycled,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{vDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vNickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vReweek,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vDouban,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vMtime,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vImdb,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vTvs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vCompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vDayhit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vWeekhit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vMonthhit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vDaytime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vWeektime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vMonthtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vExtratype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vJq,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{vLongtxt,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_data set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_name = #{vName,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_state = #{vState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_pic = #{vPic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_spic = #{vSpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_gpic = #{vGpic,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_hit = #{vHit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_money = #{vMoney,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_rank = #{vRank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_digg = #{vDigg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_tread = #{vTread,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_commend = #{vCommend,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_wrong = #{vWrong,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_ismake = #{vIsmake,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_actor = #{vActor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_color = #{vColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_publishyear = #{vPublishyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_publisharea = #{vPublisharea,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_addtime = #{vAddtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_topic = #{vTopic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_note = #{vNote,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_tags = #{vTags,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_letter = #{vLetter,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_isunion = #{vIsunion,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_recycled = #{vRecycled,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, v_director = #{vDirector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_enname = #{vEnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_lang = #{vLang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_score = #{vScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_scorenum = #{vScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_nickname = #{vNickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_reweek = #{vReweek,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_douban = #{vDouban,jdbcType=REAL}, v_mtime = #{vMtime,jdbcType=REAL}, v_imdb = #{vImdb,jdbcType=REAL}, v_tvs = #{vTvs,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_company = #{vCompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, v_dayhit = #{vDayhit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_weekhit = #{vWeekhit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_monthhit = #{vMonthhit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_daytime = #{vDaytime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_weektime = #{vWeektime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_monthtime = #{vMonthtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_len = #{vLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_total = #{vTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_ver = #{vVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_psd = #{vPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, v_extratype = #{vExtratype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, v_jq = #{vJq,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, v_longtxt = #{vLongtxt,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where v_id = #{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select v_id, tid, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_spic, v_gpic, v_hit, v_money, v_rank, v_digg, v_tread, v_commend, v_wrong, v_ismake, v_actor, v_color, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_topic, v_note, v_tags, v_letter, v_isunion, v_recycled, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_score, v_scorenum, v_nickname, v_reweek, v_douban, v_mtime, v_imdb, v_tvs, v_company, v_dayhit, v_weekhit, v_monthhit, v_daytime, v_weektime, v_monthtime, v_len, v_total, v_ver, v_psd, v_extratype, v_jq, v_longtxt from sea_data where v_id = #{vId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select v_id, tid, v_name, v_state, v_pic, v_spic, v_gpic, v_hit, v_money, v_rank, v_digg, v_tread, v_commend, v_wrong, v_ismake, v_actor, v_color, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_topic, v_note, v_tags, v_letter, v_isunion, v_recycled, v_director, v_enname, v_lang, v_score, v_scorenum, v_nickname, v_reweek, v_douban, v_mtime, v_imdb, v_tvs, v_company, v_dayhit, v_weekhit, v_monthhit, v_daytime, v_weektime, v_monthtime, v_len, v_total, v_ver, v_psd, v_extratype, v_jq, v_longtxt from sea_data

select a.v_id, a.tid, d.tname, v_name, CASE locate( 'http://', v_pic ) WHEN 0 THEN CONCAT( 'http://host812095401.s540.pppf.com.cn/upload/', v_pic ) ELSE v_pic END as v_pic, v_actor, v_publishyear, v_publisharea, v_addtime, v_director, v_enname, b.body as play, c.body as content from sea_data a , sea_playdata b, sea_content c , sea_type d where a.v_id = b.v_id and b.v_id = c.v_id and a.tid = d.tid and a.v_id = #{tid}
